content.question: The market inefficiency of a negative production externality will be eliminated if a policy is put in place that results in which of the following outcomes?

choices.label: the level of output produced is maximized
the marginal benefit of production is maximized
the marginal cost of production is minimized
the marginal social benefit of production exceeds the marginal social cost
the marginal social benefit of production is equal to the marginal social cost

content.answer: the marginal social benefit of production is equal to the marginal social cost

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

topic.text: 6.1: Socially Efficient and Inefficient Market Outcomes

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
